channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: In Idaho college town where 4 students were killed, relief and anger over Bryan Kohberger plea deal
item.description: Residents are expressing a mix of relief and anger in the small Idaho college town where four students were stabbed to death after the news that the man charged had agreed to plead guilty.

item.title: Bryan Kohberger is due to appear in court to plead guilty in University of Idaho stabbings
A day outside an LA detention center shows profound impact of ICE raids on families
